text: In the time of King Artaxerxes of the Persians, Belemus, Mithradates, Tabellius, 2:16 Rehum,Rathumus, Beeltethmus, and 2:16 Shimshai.Samellius the scribe, with their other associates, dwelling in Samaria and other places, wrote to him against those who lived in Judea and Jerusalem the following letter:
